metadata.title: CVE-2024-8517 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: SPIP before 4.3.2, 4.2.16, and4.1.18 is vulnerable to a command injection issue. Aremote and unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary operating systemcommands by sending a crafted multipart file upload HTTP request.

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
